automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_evening_routine'
alias: Office WLED Evening Routine
description: "Every day at 5:00 PM, smoothly brighten the Office WLED to 80% brightness, then after 1 minute dim it down to a relaxed 40%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 204
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 102
